keystone.core

Class KeystoneStateFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • keystone.core.KeystoneStateFlags

  • public class KeystoneStateFlags
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean AllowPlayerLook
      Whether mouse movement should move the player camera
      static boolean BlockingKeys
      If true, most keybinds will be disabled, such as movement and menu hotkeys
      static boolean CloseSelection
      If true, target the block 4 blocks in front of player.
      static boolean HideSelectionBoxes
      If true, selection boxes will not be rendered
      static boolean MouseOverGUI
      Whether the mouse is hovering over an interactable overlay widget

      KeystoneStateFlags()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CloseSelection

        public static boolean CloseSelection
        If true, target the block 4 blocks in front of player. If false, target the block the player is looking at, ignoring distance

      • AllowPlayerLook

        public static boolean AllowPlayerLook
        Whether mouse movement should move the player camera

      • MouseOverGUI

        public static boolean MouseOverGUI
        Whether the mouse is hovering over an interactable overlay widget

      • BlockingKeys

        public static boolean BlockingKeys
        If true, most keybinds will be disabled, such as movement and menu hotkeys

      • HideSelectionBoxes

        public static boolean HideSelectionBoxes
        If true, selection boxes will not be rendered

        public KeystoneStateFlags()
